Climate Change

1. Global Economic Impacts of the Physical Climate Risks on Agriculture and Energy (Forthcoming)
[Working Paper: CAMA | Conference Paper: GTAP | Results Dashboard].
2. Global Economic Impacts of Physical Climate Risks (2023)
(co-authored with Caterina Lepore) [Working Paper: IMF | Results Dashboard].
3. Why Climate Scenarios are Important, How to Use Them, and What has been Learned (2022)
(co-authored with Warwick McKibbin and Weifeng Liu) [Policy Brief: Brookings].
4. Running the NGFS Scenarios in G-Cubed: a Tale of Two Modeling Frameworks (2022)
(co-authored with Warwick McKibbin et al.) [Occasional Paper: NGFS | Results Dashboard].
5. Global Economic Impacts of Climate Shocks, Climate Policy, and Changes in Climate Risk Assessment (2021)
(co-authored with Warwick McKibbin and Weifeng Liu) [Working Paper: Brookings | CEPR | CAMA | SSRN].
6. Averting a Tragedy of Solar Commons: When Free may not be the Best (2021)
(co-authored with Alexandra Sidorenko) [Policy Brief: Australian Energy Market Commission].

COVID-19

[Journal Article: Economic Modeling (Under Review) | Working Paper: Brookings | CEPR | CAMA | SSRN |
Results Dashboard].
3. Global Macroeconomic Impacts of COVID-19: Seven Scenarios (2021)
(co-authored with Warwick McKibbin) [Journal Article: Asian Economic Papers |
Working Paper: Brookings | CEPR | CAMA | SSRN].
4. The Economic Impact of COVID-19 (2020)
(co-authored with Warwick McKibbin) [Book Chapter: CEPR].
